content.text: Where every bride & groom's story begins.
content.html: Where every bride & groom's story begins.

content.text: BEHIND THE BOUTIQUE
content.html: BEHIND THE BOUTIQUE

content.text: Experience a thoughtfully curated collection of bridal gowns and suits, where style, service, and sincerity come together to celebrate your love story.
content.html: Experience a thoughtfully curated collection of bridal gowns and suits, where style, service, and sincerity come together to celebrate your love story.

content.text: Minnesota’s Destination for Effortless Bridal Style
content.html: Minnesota’s Destination for Effortless Bridal Style

content.text: Bridal Luxury, Simplified
content.html: Bridal Luxury, Simplified

content.text: Welcome to Bridal Aisle Boutique, Minnesota’s premier destination for new off-the-rack designer wedding dresses and tailored suits. With over 2,000 gowns in a wide range of styles and sizes, we make it simple to find the one that feels like you, and take it home the very same day.Our boutique is known for its warm, welcoming atmosphere and experienced stylists who make your experience joyful, stress-free, and unforgettable. Whether you’re shopping for a gown, a suit, or accessories to complete your look, you’ll find everything you need under one roof.
content.html:
Welcome to Bridal Aisle Boutique, Minnesota’s premier destination for new off-the-rack designer wedding dresses and tailored suits. With over 2,000 gowns in a wide range of styles and sizes, we make it simple to find the one that feels like you, and take it home the very same day.

Our boutique is known for its warm, welcoming atmosphere and experienced stylists who make your experience joyful, stress-free, and unforgettable. Whether you’re shopping for a gown, a suit, or accessories to complete your look, you’ll find everything you need under one roof.

content.text: “We believe every couple deserves to look and feel their best—without the stress.”
content.html: “We believe every couple deserves to look and feel their best—without the stress.”

content.text: - Annette hall, Bridal aisle ceo & Founder
content.html: - Annette hall, Bridal aisle ceo & Founder

content.text: Bridal Aisle Boutique was created with a simple mission: to make the joy of wedding dress and suit shopping feel effortless, authentic, and unforgettable. From our curated collection to our personalized consultations, every detail is designed with you in mind.We take pride in offering exceptional service, honest guidance, and an inclusive experience, so every couple feels seen, celebrated, and confident walking down the aisle.
content.html:
Bridal Aisle Boutique was created with a simple mission: to make the joy of wedding dress and suit shopping feel effortless, authentic, and unforgettable. From our curated collection to our personalized consultations, every detail is designed with you in mind.

We take pride in offering exceptional service, honest guidance, and an inclusive experience, so every couple feels seen, celebrated, and confident walking down the aisle.

content.text: A bridal boutique built on heart & honesty
content.html: A bridal boutique built on heart & honesty

content.text: A legacy of love & dedication
content.html: A legacy of love & dedication

content.text: Founded by Annette and Brad in 2013, Bridal Aisle began with a simple idea: brides deserve stunning designer gowns without the designer price tag. What started as a small, heartfelt endeavor has grown into a trusted name across the Midwest.With a background in fashion merchandising and a passion for exceptional service, Annette shaped the foundation of the boutique on expertise, value, and genuine connection. Today, Bridal Aisle continues to help couples find their perfect look—their way.From one intimate storefront to a spacious, sought-after boutique, Bridal Aisle has grown alongside the couples we serve. In 2020, we expanded with Budget Bridal Outlet by BA, offering gowns priced at $600 and under to ensure every bride can find something beautiful within reach.Now home to Bridal Aisle Boutique and Budget Bridal Outlet, as well as discounted suit rentals for wedding parties, we remain committed to making every “yes” joyful, authentic, and stress-free.
content.html:
Founded by Annette and Brad in 2013, Bridal Aisle began with a simple idea: brides deserve stunning designer gowns without the designer price tag. What started as a small, heartfelt endeavor has grown into a trusted name across the Midwest.

With a background in fashion merchandising and a passion for exceptional service, Annette shaped the foundation of the boutique on expertise, value, and genuine connection. Today, Bridal Aisle continues to help couples find their perfect look—their way.

From one intimate storefront to a spacious, sought-after boutique, Bridal Aisle has grown alongside the couples we serve. In 2020, we expanded with Budget Bridal Outlet by BA, offering gowns priced at $600 and under to ensure every bride can find something beautiful within reach.

Now home to Bridal Aisle Boutique and Budget Bridal Outlet, as well as discounted suit rentals for wedding parties, we remain committed to making every “yes” joyful, authentic, and stress-free.

content.text: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment
content.html: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment

content.text: Keep an open mind about what you want and what you’ll ultimately fall in love with - In the 14 years I have owned the business, I have seen brides go home with completely opposite dresses than they envisioned.
content.html: Keep an open mind about what you want and what you’ll ultimately fall in love with - In the 14 years I have owned the business, I have seen brides go home with completely opposite dresses than they envisioned.

content.text: Tell us a bit about yourself
content.html: Tell us a bit about yourself

content.text: After over a decade in business, running Bridal Aisle has been so fulfilling and has allowed me to pour joy into other areas of my life. Outside of work, my family is very important to me (getting together with my grown children and grand daughter specifically) and riding my horse Charlie!
content.html: After over a decade in business, running Bridal Aisle has been so fulfilling and has allowed me to pour joy into other areas of my life. Outside of work, my family is very important to me (getting together with my grown children and grand daughter specifically) and riding my horse Charlie!

content.text: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST
content.html: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST

content.text: I love meeting all of our clients and hearing their beautiful stories - I get a lot of energy from it! Their input and opinions help us know how to best serve our couples by bringing in new styles and keeping up with the best trends. Seeing everyone in their most happy moment is my favorite!
content.html: I love meeting all of our clients and hearing their beautiful stories - I get a lot of energy from it! Their input and opinions help us know how to best serve our couples by bringing in new styles and keeping up with the best trends. Seeing everyone in their most happy moment is my favorite!

content.html: Kaitlin

content.text: Operations Manager
content.html: Operations Manager

content.text: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment
content.html: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment

content.text: Every bride’s “yes” moment is different. Many brides (and the entourage) expect to cry knowing that the dress is ‘the one.’ When in reality most brides just have an overall feeling of joy or contentment. If you can picture yourself walking down the aisle to your person, or don’t want to take the dress off, those are pretty good indications you’ve found your dress (even if you don’t have the moment you are expecting to have)!
content.html: Every bride’s “yes” moment is different. Many brides (and the entourage) expect to cry knowing that the dress is ‘the one.’ When in reality most brides just have an overall feeling of joy or contentment. If you can picture yourself walking down the aisle to your person, or don’t want to take the dress off, those are pretty good indications you’ve found your dress (even if you don’t have the moment you are expecting to have)!

content.text: Tell us a bit about yourself
content.html: Tell us a bit about yourself

content.text: I have always been passionate about bridal and after over 5 years at Bridal Aisle, it is safe to say I feel at home here! When I am not at the boutique, I can typically be found spending time with my family or curling up on the couch with a good book or the newest season of Love is Blind!
content.html: I have always been passionate about bridal and after over 5 years at Bridal Aisle, it is safe to say I feel at home here! When I am not at the boutique, I can typically be found spending time with my family or curling up on the couch with a good book or the newest season of Love is Blind!

content.text: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST
content.html: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST

content.text: Every once in a while I will be working with a bride and one of their wedding songs, or a song that reminds them of a loved one who has passed, has come on while they are saying “Yes!” to their dress. It has given me chills every time a bride has this serendipitous moment.
content.html: Every once in a while I will be working with a bride and one of their wedding songs, or a song that reminds them of a loved one who has passed, has come on while they are saying “Yes!” to their dress. It has given me chills every time a bride has this serendipitous moment.

content.text: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST
content.html: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST

content.text: My favorite part of being a Bridal Stylist is getting to help the Bride find what she is truly looking for whether it is what she walks into the shop looking for or something completely different (Which happens more that you may think!). My favorite moment during the appointment is definitely the look the Bride has when she finds the perfect dress!
content.html: My favorite part of being a Bridal Stylist is getting to help the Bride find what she is truly looking for whether it is what she walks into the shop looking for or something completely different (Which happens more that you may think!). My favorite moment during the appointment is definitely the look the Bride has when she finds the perfect dress!

content.text: Remember that it is your wedding day & that your dress is for you, not anyone else. Everyone will have an opinion but whatever dress makes you feel beautiful & confident is the one for you.

Marketing
lead

content.text: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment
content.html: one piece of advice you would like to pass on to brides before their appointment

content.text: As I mentioned, I try on a lot of gowns for social media purposes. With this, there have been numerous dresses that I disliked on the hanger, then tried on, and my jaw was on the floor in disbelief on how good it looked on! So I would give every dress pulled a chance; even if it looks “off” on the hanger.
content.html: As I mentioned, I try on a lot of gowns for social media purposes. With this, there have been numerous dresses that I disliked on the hanger, then tried on, and my jaw was on the floor in disbelief on how good it looked on! So I would give every dress pulled a chance; even if it looks “off” on the hanger.

content.text: Tell us a bit about yourself
content.html: Tell us a bit about yourself

content.text: It is so wonderful working here at Bridal Aisle because I am very passionate about all things fashion. I love second-hand clothing shopping and also sewing new things with older fabric. Along with sewing, I also enjoy gardening and painting. My cat, Pepper, tries to help with some of my projects, but he is more cute than helpful.
content.html: It is so wonderful working here at Bridal Aisle because I am very passionate about all things fashion. I love second-hand clothing shopping and also sewing new things with older fabric. Along with sewing, I also enjoy gardening and painting. My cat, Pepper, tries to help with some of my projects, but he is more cute than helpful.

content.text: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST
content.html: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST

content.text: Although I do only the social media here at BA, I would say my favorite thing to witness while at the store is the joy of a bride who found her wedding dress. I try on a lot of dresses and I know the feeling of really feeling like a dress was “made for me”. I can only imagine how a real bride must feel!
content.html: Although I do only the social media here at BA, I would say my favorite thing to witness while at the store is the joy of a bride who found her wedding dress. I try on a lot of dresses and I know the feeling of really feeling like a dress was “made for me”. I can only imagine how a real bride must feel!

content.text: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST
content.html: FAVORITE PART ABOUT BEING A BRIDAL STYLIST

content.text: I love meeting all the new brides and hearing about their wedding day vision. My favorite part of an appointment is when the bride looks at me and in that moment I know it’s her dress.
content.html: I love meeting all the new brides and hearing about their wedding day vision. My favorite part of an appointment is when the bride looks at me and in that moment I know it’s her dress.

content.text: Your day, done your way
content.html: Your day, done your way

content.text: From the moment you walk in, our team is here to make your experience as special as your wedding day. Choose from three appointment options, enjoy one-on-one styling guidance, and say yes to your dress or suit with confidence.Every appointment is crafted to reflect your personality, your budget, and your vision.
content.html:
From the moment you walk in, our team is here to make your experience as special as your wedding day. Choose from three appointment options, enjoy one-on-one styling guidance, and say yes to your dress or suit with confidence.

Every appointment is crafted to reflect your personality, your budget, and your vision.

content.text: Our Awards
content.html: Our Awards

content.text: Is there a way I can add more than 5 stars? Because this place deserves it!! Not only are the owners and employees extremely friendly and helpful, but they also listened to what my vision was and then made it come to life significantly under my budget. I loved that they let me look around first to show them what I wanted. Found the dress of my dreams for only $800, and took it home that same day, and I will recommend this place to everyone looking for formal attire.”
content.html: Is there a way I can add more than 5 stars? Because this place deserves it!! Not only are the owners and employees extremely friendly and helpful, but they also listened to what my vision was and then made it come to life significantly under my budget. I loved that they let me look around first to show them what I wanted. Found the dress of my dreams for only $800, and took it home that same day, and I will recommend this place to everyone looking for formal attire.”

content.text: FAQ
content.html: FAQ

content.text: Do I need to set up an appointment to try on wedding dresses?
content.html: Do I need to set up an appointment to try on wedding dresses?

content.text: Yes. We require all brides to book appointments. Don’t hesitate to make your appointment as we book up well in advance. Appointments allow us to provide you and your party with the attention and experience you deserve.
content.html: Yes. We require all brides to book appointments. Don’t hesitate to make your appointment as we book up well in advance. Appointments allow us to provide you and your party with the attention and experience you deserve.

content.text: FAQ
content.html: FAQ

content.text: Why do you charge for bridal appointments?
content.html: Why do you charge for bridal appointments?

content.text: During your bridal appointment, you are guaranteed one-on-one attention with a dedicated stylist to guide and assist with your selection, and the exclusive use of an area in the boutique. Our bridal gown appointments are 90 minutes for brides who are ready to take their dream dress home!
content.html: During your bridal appointment, you are guaranteed one-on-one attention with a dedicated stylist to guide and assist with your selection, and the exclusive use of an area in the boutique. Our bridal gown appointments are 90 minutes for brides who are ready to take their dream dress home!

content.text: FAQ
content.html: FAQ

content.text: If I find a wedding dress but want to come back with a friend the next day, how long could you hold my dress until I return to the shop?
content.html: If I find a wedding dress but want to come back with a friend the next day, how long could you hold my dress until I return to the shop?

content.text: We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!
content.html:
We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.

If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!
